duties_responsibilities.duty: Create process flows, wireframes, and visual design mockups to conceptualize and communicate detailed interaction behaviors.
Define business and feature requirements using empirical online data, usability findings, and UCD principles.
Optimize the performance of new and existing features through usability testing and analytics data interpretation.
Present design work to the user experience team, product team, and company executives for review and feedback.
Contribute to user interface design and development best practices and standards.
Provide leadership in the area of ecommerce trends, web application design, and user interface innovations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in design, human-computer interaction (HCI), or equivalent professional experience.
